original: @76a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @76a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya dzny'a na satva manydzu shr'i tattva s'a dha na n'a ma /
analyzed: a'arya dzny'a na satva manydzu shr'i tattva s'a dha na n'a ma /
translated: Ārya-jñānasattva-mañjuśrī-tattva-sādhana-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Attaining the Noble Mañjuśrī, the Bodhisattva of Wisdom, Called The Essential Truth

original: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Mañjuśrī, the Bodhisattva of Wisdom.

original: nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i 'ching gcod pa'i //
analyzed: nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i 'ching gcod pa'i //
translated: Cutting the bonds of the ocean of afflictions,

original: sdug bsngal gcod la phyag 'tshal nas //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gcod la phyag 'tshal nas //
translated: Homage to the cutter of suffering,

original: lam gyi rim pa yang dag don //
analyzed: lam gyi rim pa yang dag don //
translated: The stages of the path, the perfect truth,

original: dran nas bdag gis rab tu bshad //
analyzed: dran nas bdag gis rab tu bshad //
translated: Having remembered, I shall fully explain.

original: re zhig yid 'ong gnas dag tu //
analyzed: re zhig yid 'ong gnas dag tu //
translated: First, in a pleasing place,

original: bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste //
analyzed: bde ba'i stan la nyer 'dug ste //
translated: Sitting on a comfortable seat,

original: mchod cing bstod nas sdig bshags bya //
analyzed: mchod cing bstod nas sdig bshags bya //
translated: Having made offerings and praises, confess misdeeds,

original: tshad med bzhi @76b ni rab tu bsgom //
analyzed: tshad med bzhi @76b ni rab tu bsgom //
translated: And fully cultivate the four immeasurables.

original: aom ma h'a sh'un+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: aom ma h'a sh'un+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Oṃ mahā-śūnyatā-jñāna-vajra-svabhāva-ātmako 'haṃ

original: zhes bsgom mo //
analyzed: zhes bsgom mo //
translated: Meditate on this.

original: dang por bdag nyid aa bsgom ste //
analyzed: dang por bdag nyid aa bsgom ste //
translated: First, meditate on oneself as A,

original: bam las padma 'dab bzhi ni //
analyzed: bam las padma 'dab bzhi ni //
translated: From Vaṃ, a four-petaled lotus,

original: chos 'byung rdo rje'i nang du bsgom //
analyzed: chos 'byung rdo rje'i nang du bsgom //
translated: Meditate on the source of phenomena within the vajra.

original: bdag nyid zla ba'i steng bsam mo //
analyzed: bdag nyid zla ba'i steng bsam mo //
translated: Think of oneself on the moon.

original: de las sdug bsngal gcod pa ni //
analyzed: de las sdug bsngal gcod pa ni //
translated: From that, the one who severs suffering

original: sku mdog mthing ga 'gying bag can ;
analyzed: sku mdog mthing ga 'gying bag can ;
translated: is blue, with a swaying motion,

original: / rdo rje autpala brtan pa'i sku //
analyzed: / rdo rje autpala brtan pa'i sku //
translated: the body of the firm vajra lotus.

original: zla ba'i steng du aa bsam mo //
analyzed: zla ba'i steng du aa bsam mo //
translated: Think of the letter A on the moon.

original: 'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng du ni //🔽aa a'a aam aa:/
analyzed: 'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng du ni // aa a'a aam aa:/
translated: On the moon on the four petals

original: tshad med bzhi ldan yum bzhi ni //
analyzed: tshad med bzhi ldan yum bzhi ni //
translated: are the four mothers endowed with the four immeasurables:🔽A, Ā, Aṃ, and Aḥ,

original: 'gying bag autpala bcas pa'i sku //
analyzed: 'gying bag autpala bcas pa'i sku //
translated: with swaying motions and lotuses.🔽Think of them in order,

original: rdo rje skyil krung mdun bdar nas //🔽go rims bzhin du rab tu bsam //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung mdun bdar nas // go rims bzhin du rab tu bsam //
translated: facing forward in vajra posture.

original: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas //
translated: Having invited the awareness beings,

original: sku gsum byin brlab dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: sku gsum byin brlab dbang bskur ro //
translated: empower them with the three bodies.

original: de nas don dang rab ldan pas //
analyzed: de nas don dang rab ldan pas //
translated: Then, endowed with the meaning,

original: mtshan rnams rab tu brjod par bya //
analyzed: mtshan rnams rab tu brjod par bya //
translated: recite the epithets.

original: aom du:kha tstshe da /
analyzed: aom du:kha tstshe da /
translated: Oṃ duḥkhe ca tsheda

original: na ma ste ba ra da badzr'a gra /
analyzed: na ma ste ba ra da badzr'a gra /
translated: namaḥ śrīvaravajra

original: bh'u ta ko ti na ma stu te /
analyzed: bh'u ta ko ti na ma stu te /
translated: bhūtakoṭi namaste

original: na ma ste sh'u n+ya t'a garbha /
analyzed: na ma ste sh'u n+ya t'a garbha /
translated: namaḥ śūnyatāgarbha

original: buddha bodhi na ma stu te ho:/
analyzed: buddha bodhi na ma stu te ho:/
translated: buddha bodhi namaste hoḥ.

original: de nas ldang bar 'dod na mu:dang bcas pas gshegs su gsol la //
analyzed: de nas ldang bar 'dod na mu:dang bcas pas gshegs su gsol la //
translated: Then, if one wishes to rise, one should request [the deities] to depart with MU and

original: dam tshig gis ldang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gis ldang bar bya'o //
translated: one should rise with the pledge.

original: bcom ldan ngag gi dbang phyug ni //🔽rin chen autpala gser gyi mdog / padma 'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng //
analyzed: bcom ldan ngag gi dbang phyug ni // rin chen autpala gser gyi mdog / padma 'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng //
translated: The Bhagavat Vāgīśvara🔽is the color of gold, with a jewel and utpala [flower],

original: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
translated: seated in vajra posture on a moon on a four-petaled lotus.

original: 'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng du ni //
analyzed: 'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng du ni //
translated: On the four petals and moon

original: aa a'a aam aa:yum bzhi'o //
analyzed: aa a'a aam aa:yum bzhi'o //
translated: are the four mothers, A, Ā, Aṃ, and Aḥ.

original: spyan drangs mchod dang bstim byas nas //
analyzed: spyan drangs mchod dang bstim byas nas //
translated: Having invited [the deities], made offerings, and dissolved [them],

original: byin brlab dbang bskur mtshan gdon no //
analyzed: byin brlab dbang bskur mtshan gdon no //
translated: one should bless, confer empowerment, and give a name.

original: aom b'a g'i shva ra buddha r'a ga na ma ste stu /🔽buddha k'a ma na mo na ma:/🔽buddha pr'i ti na ma stu bhyam /
analyzed: aom b'a g'i shva ra buddha r'a ga na ma ste stu / buddha k'a ma na mo na ma:/ buddha pr'i ti na ma stu bhyam /
translated: Oṃ, Vāgīśvara Buddha Rāga, I pay homage to you!🔽I pay homage to Buddha Kāmā!🔽I pay homage to you, Buddha Prīti!

original: buddha tu bhy'am bu ta na ma:/
analyzed: buddha tu bhy'am bu ta na ma:/
translated: I pay homage to you, Buddha Tuva!

original: zhes brjod nas /
analyzed: zhes brjod nas /
translated: Having recited this,

original: mu:zhes gshegs su gsol nas spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: mu:zhes gshegs su gsol nas spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o //
translated: one should request [the deities] to depart with MU and remain in the conduct.

original: rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba'i nang //
analyzed: rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba'i nang //
translated: In the midst of blazing vajras,

original: 'dab bzhi dmar ba'i zla ba'i steng //
analyzed: 'dab bzhi dmar ba'i zla ba'i steng //
translated: on a moon on a four-petaled lotus,

original: aa las byung ba rnon po ni //
analyzed: aa las byung ba rnon po ni //
translated: from A arises the sharp one,

original: mdog dmar padma autpala bsnams //
analyzed: mdog dmar padma autpala bsnams //
translated: Red in color, holding a lotus and utpala,

original: rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung zla ba'i steng //
translated: in vajra posture on a moon.

original: 'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng du ni //
analyzed: 'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng du ni //
translated: On a moon on the four petals

original: aa a'a aam aa:yum bzhi ni //
analyzed: aa a'a aam aa:yum bzhi ni //
translated: are the four mothers, A, A, Aṃ, and Aḥ,

original: 'gying bag gtso la phyogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'gying bag gtso la phyogs pa'o //
translated: coquettish, facing the principal.

original: spyan drangs mchod dang bstim byas nas //
analyzed: spyan drangs mchod dang bstim byas nas //
translated: Having invited them, made offerings, and dissolved them,

original: byin brlab dbang bskur mtshan gdon no //
analyzed: byin brlab dbang bskur mtshan gdon no //
translated: bless, confer empowerment, and give a name.

original: aom badzra t'ikshna /
analyzed: aom badzra t'ikshna /
translated: Oṃ vajra tiṣṭha

original: buddha mo da na mo na ma:/
analyzed: buddha mo da na mo na ma:/
translated: Buddha mohana mohana

original: buddh'a smi ta na ma stu bhyam /🔽buddha h'a sa na mo na ma:/🔽buddh'a ba' tsa n'a ma ste stu /
analyzed: buddh'a smi ta na ma stu bhyam / buddha h'a sa na mo na ma:/ buddh'a ba' tsa n'a ma ste stu /
translated: Buddha smitana stutvaṃ🔽Buddha hāsana mohana🔽Buddha vācana stute stu

original: buddho bh'a ba na mo na ma:/
analyzed: buddho bh'a ba na mo na ma:/
translated: Buddha bhāvana mohana

original: @77a * // zhes brjod nas mu:zhes gshegs su gsol nas spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: @77a * // zhes brjod nas mu:zhes gshegs su gsol nas spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o //
translated: Having recited this, with muḥ one should request them to depart and remain in the conduct.

original: shes rab rang bzhin stong pa'i nang //
analyzed: shes rab rang bzhin stong pa'i nang //
translated: In the emptiness of the nature of wisdom,

original: snying rjes mtshon pa'i gdan bsams te //
analyzed: snying rjes mtshon pa'i gdan bsams te //
translated: one should imagine a seat marked with compassion,

original: byang chub sems kyi sa bon te //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi sa bon te //
translated: the seed of bodhicitta,

original: shes rab ye shes aa las bskyed //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes aa las bskyed //
translated: generated from the A of the wisdom consort.

original: sku mdog dkar po rab tu mdzes //
analyzed: sku mdog dkar po rab tu mdzes //
translated: White in color, very beautiful,

original: 'khor lo autpala yang dag ldan //
analyzed: 'khor lo autpala yang dag ldan //
translated: The wheel is endowed with utpalas.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du ni //
translated: On the moon disk

original: rdo rje skyil krung bcas par bsam //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung bcas par bsam //
translated: one should imagine him seated in the vajra posture.

original: 'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng du ni //🔽aa a'a aam aa:yum bzhi bsgom //
analyzed: 'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng du ni // aa a'a aam aa:yum bzhi bsgom //
translated: On the moon on the four petals

original: pra kri ti pa ri shuddha:/
analyzed: pra kri ti pa ri shuddha:/
translated: one should meditate on the four mothers, A, A, Aṃ, and Aḥ.

original: sarba dharm'a ya du ta /
analyzed: sarba dharm'a ya du ta /
translated: prakṛtipariśuddhaḥ

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta dh'u ba p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta dh'u ba p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
translated: sarvadharmā yadutā sarvatathāgatadharmma­dhātu­puṇya­megha­samudra­spharaṇa­saṃvaraṇīye hūṃ

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta pushpa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /🔽sarba ta th'a ga ta a'a lo ke p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta pushpa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um / sarba ta th'a ga ta a'a lo ke p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
translated: sarvatathāgatapuṣpa­pūja­megha­samudra­spharaṇa­saṃvaraṇīye hūṃ🔽sarvatathāgatālokakaraṇa­pūja­megha­samudra­spharaṇa­saṃvaraṇīye hūṃ

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta gandha p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /🔽sarba ta th'a ga ta ni bi tye p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta gandha p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um / sarba ta th'a ga ta ni bi tye p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
translated: sarvatathāgatadhūpa­pūja­megha­samudra­spharaṇa­saṃvaraṇīye hūṃ🔽sarvatathāgatagandhāpūja­megha­samudra­spharaṇa­saṃvaraṇīye hūṃ

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta shapta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta shapta p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye h'um /
translated: sarvatathāgatavādipūja­megha­samudra­spharaṇa­saṃvaraṇīye hūṃ

original: zhes mchod nas dza:h'um bam ho:zhes bstim mo //
analyzed: zhes mchod nas dza:h'um bam ho:zhes bstim mo //
translated: Having made offerings, one should dissolve with jḥḥḥṃ vaṃ hoḥ.

original: aom h'um hr'i:bha ga b'a na /
analyzed: aom h'um hr'i:bha ga b'a na /
translated: oṃ hūṃ hrīḥ bhagavān

original: dzny'a na m'urti /
analyzed: dzny'a na m'urti /
translated: jñānamūrti

original: b'a g'i shva ra /
analyzed: b'a g'i shva ra /
translated: vāgīśvara

original: ma h'a wa tsa /🔽sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
analyzed: ma h'a wa tsa / sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya /
translated: mahāvacā🔽sarvatathāgatahṛdaya

original: sarba dharm'a ga ga na /
analyzed: sarba dharm'a ga ga na /
translated: sarvadharmāgaganā

original: aa ma la su pa ri shuddha /
analyzed: aa ma la su pa ri shuddha /
translated: amalasupariśuddha

original: dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:/
analyzed: dharma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha a'a:/
translated: dharmadhātujñānagarbha āḥ.

original: zhes brjod nas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gdon par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod nas mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gdon par bya'o //
translated: Having recited this, one should recite the Praise in Verse of the Names.

original: aom pra dzny'a dzny'a na m'urta ye /
analyzed: aom pra dzny'a dzny'a na m'urta ye /
translated: oṃ prajñājñānamūrtaye

original: aa bha bodbha ba na ma stu ste /
analyzed: aa bha bodbha ba na ma stu ste /
translated: abhāvodbhavanamastu te

original: na ma ste buddha sam bha ba /
analyzed: na ma ste buddha sam bha ba /
translated: namastvanubhavāya ca

original: ga ga nodbha ba na ma stu bhyam /
analyzed: ga ga nodbha ba na ma stu bhyam /
translated: gagano d bhavanamastu bhyaṃ

original: na ma ste dzny'a na sam bha ba /
analyzed: na ma ste dzny'a na sam bha ba /
translated: namastajñānasambhava

original: zhes bstod nas mu:zhes brjod nas spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bstod nas mu:zhes brjod nas spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o //
translated: Having praised, one should recite muḥ and remain in the conduct.

original: shes rab kyis ni h'um las bskyed ;
analyzed: shes rab kyis ni h'um las bskyed ;
translated: By wisdom, one should generate from hūṃ.

original: / snying rje ma chags padma'i gdan //
analyzed: / snying rje ma chags padma'i gdan //
translated: Compassion is the lotus seat of non-attachment.

original: byang chub sems las byung ba'i steng //
analyzed: byang chub sems las byung ba'i steng //
translated: Upon that, from bodhicitta,

original: aa ni rab tu gsal bar bya //
analyzed: aa ni rab tu gsal bar bya //
translated: a is made very clear.

original: ye shes sku ni ljang gu ste //
analyzed: ye shes sku ni ljang gu ste //
translated: The wisdom body is green,

original: rgya gram autpala bsnams pa yis //
analyzed: rgya gram autpala bsnams pa yis //
translated: holding a crossed vajra and utpala flower.

original: sems bskyed pa yi sa bon te //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa yi sa bon te //
translated: It is the seed of the generation of the mind of awakening,

original: rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs //
translated: sitting in vajra posture.

original: 'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng na ni //
analyzed: 'dab bzhi zla ba'i steng na ni //
translated: On the four petals and moon seats,

original: aa a'a aam aa:yum bzhi bskyed //
analyzed: aa a'a aam aa:yum bzhi bskyed //
translated: the four mothers are generated: a, ā, am, and aḥ.

original: ye shes gnyis med bstim byas nas //
analyzed: ye shes gnyis med bstim byas nas //
translated: Having dissolved the nondual wisdom,🔽the consecration, empowerment, and perfection

original: byin brlab dbang bskur rdzogs pa dang // mtshan ni yang dag brjod par bya //
analyzed: byin brlab dbang bskur rdzogs pa dang // mtshan ni yang dag brjod par bya //
translated: are to be expressed by the true name.

original: de nas bstod pa 'dis bstod do //
analyzed: de nas bstod pa 'dis bstod do //
translated: Then, one should praise with this praise:

original: aom dzny'a na k'a ya /
analyzed: aom dzny'a na k'a ya /
translated: Oṃ jñāna kāya

original: m'a ya dz'a la na ma stu bhyam /
analyzed: m'a ya dz'a la na ma stu bhyam /
translated: māyā jālā namaḥ stuvaṃ

original: n'a ma ste buddha n'a ta ka /
analyzed: n'a ma ste buddha n'a ta ka /
translated: nāma stute buddhānāṃ

original: @77b na ma ste sarba sarbe bhyam /
analyzed: @77b na ma ste sarba sarbe bhyam /
translated: tathā sarva sarve bhyaṃ

original: dzny'a na k'a ya na ma stu te /
analyzed: dzny'a na k'a ya na ma stu te /
translated: jñāna kāya namaḥ stu te🔽oṃ āḥ hūṃ muḥ

original: aom a'a:h'um mu:/ zhes spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o //🔽dri med ye shes las byung ba //
analyzed: aom a'a:h'um mu:/ zhes spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o // dri med ye shes las byung ba //
translated: One should remain in the conduct.🔽Whatever stainless virtue is attained

original: dge ba dri med gang thob des //
analyzed: dge ba dri med gang thob des //
translated: arising from stainless wisdom,🔽by that, may migrating beings,

original: 'gro rnams srid pa las grol nas //
analyzed: 'gro rnams srid pa las grol nas //
translated: liberated from existence,

original: bla med byang chub thob par shog / de kho na nyid kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon gnyis su med pa spas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: bla med byang chub thob par shog / de kho na nyid kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon gnyis su med pa spas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The Means of Achieving the Real, composed by the master Advayavajra, is complete.🔽Translated by the paṇḍita Dharmaśrīmitra and the

original: // / pandi ta dharmma shr'i mi tra dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta dharmma shr'i mi tra dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o//
